summary_gpt: Larsen & Toubro Limited has confirmed the payment of Rs. 113.70 crore interest on its non-convertible debentures and the full redemption of Rs. 1,500 crore on the maturity date of May 2, 2025. The company adhered to regulatory requirements and completed the redemption as scheduled, with no delays reported.

Larsen & Toubro Limited has announced its participation in a virtual Q4/FY25 earnings conference call scheduled for May 8, 2025, to discuss financial results with analysts and institutional investors. The company is complying with SEBI regulations by informing the stock exchanges about this upcoming event.

Larsen & Toubro Limited has disclosed details of its outstanding non-convertible debentures (NCDs) as of March 31, 2025, including listing information and hyperlinks to stock exchange notifications. The filing primarily provides regulatory compliance details related to debt instruments and their listing status.

Larsen & Toubro has confirmed the payment of Rs.154.50 crore interest on its non-convertible debentures due on April 28, 2025, with no delays or redemption activities reported. The company maintains compliance with SEBI regulations and has provided detailed disclosures regarding interest payments.

Larsen & Toubro has confirmed the payment of Rs.192.50 crore interest and full redemption of Rs.2,500 crore for its non-convertible debentures due on April 28, 2025, with no delays or issues reported. The company has completed its debt obligations related to this issuance as per regulatory requirements.

Larsen & Toubro Limited has scheduled a board meeting on May 8, 2025, to consider and approve its audited financial results for the fiscal year ending March 31, 2025, and to recommend dividends if any. The company is complying with SEBI regulations by informing stakeholders in advance.

Larsen & Toubro has confirmed the payment of Rs.144 crore interest on its non-convertible debentures due on April 23, 2025, with no delays or changes in payment terms. The company has not reported any redemption activity or related issues in this filing.
